dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4983 IH: Keeping Official Territories Eligible for Land-use Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To repeal a prohibition against the use of funds for site acquisition, development, or construction of any facility in Israel, Jerusalem, or the West Bank.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Keeping Official Territories Eligible for Land-use Act or the KOTEL Act.
Section 414 of the Omnibus Diplomatic Security and Antiterrorism Act of 1986 (22 U.S.C. 4862) is repealed.
